Package me.agno.gridjavacore.server

Interface IGridServer<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
GridServer
public interface IGridServer<T>
The IGridServer interface represents a grid server that provides methods for configuring and retrieving grid data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IGridServer<T>
    autoGenerateColumns()
    Automatically generates columns for the grid server instance.
    IGridServer<T>
    filterable()
    Retrieves a grid server instance that supports filtering functionality.

  • Method Details

    • setColumns

      IGridServer<T> setColumns(Consumer<IGridColumnCollection<T>> columnBuilder)
      Sets the columns of the grid server using a column builder function.
      Parameters:
      columnBuilder - a consumer function that takes an IGridColumnCollection parameter, used to build the grid columns
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated columns

    • withPaging

      IGridServer<T> withPaging(int pageSize)
      Sets the page size for paging in the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - the number of items to display per page
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated page size

    • withPaging

      IGridServer<T> withPaging(int pageSize, int maxDisplayedItems)
      Sets the paging options for the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - the number of items to display per page
      maxDisplayedItems - the maximum number of items to display in the grid
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated paging options

    • withPaging

      IGridServer<T> withPaging(int pageSize, int maxDisplayedItems, String queryStringParameterName)
      Sets the paging options for the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - the number of items to display per page
      maxDisplayedItems - the maximum number of items to display in the grid
      queryStringParameterName - the name of the query string parameter used for paging
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated paging options

    • sortable

      IGridServer<T> sortable()
      Returns a grid server instance that supports sorting functionality.
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with sorting enabled

    • sortable

      IGridServer<T> sortable(boolean enable, GridSortMode gridSortMode)
      Returns a grid server instance that supports sorting functionality.
      Parameters:
      enable - a boolean value indicating whether sorting should be enabled or not
      gridSortMode - an enum value representing the sort mode for the grid server instance
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with sorting enabled or disabled based on the parameters

    • filterable

      IGridServer<T> filterable()
      Retrieves a grid server instance that supports filtering functionality.
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with filtering enabled

    • filterable

      IGridServer<T> filterable(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables filtering functionality for the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      enable - a boolean value indicating whether filtering should be enabled or not
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with filtering enabled or disabled based on the parameter

    • searchable

      IGridServer<T> searchable()
      Retrieves a grid server instance that supports searching functionality.
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with searching enabled

    • searchable

      IGridServer<T> searchable(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables the searching functionality for the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      enable - a boolean value indicating whether searching should be enabled or not
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with searching enabled or disabled based on the parameter

    • searchable

      IGridServer<T> searchable(boolean enable, boolean onlyTextColumns)
      Enables or disables the searchable functionality for the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      enable - a boolean value indicating whether searching should be enabled or not
      onlyTextColumns - a boolean value indicating whether to search only in text columns or not
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with searching enabled or disabled based on the parameters

    • searchable

      IGridServer<T> searchable(boolean enable, boolean onlyTextColumns, boolean hiddenColumns)
      Enables or disables the searchable functionality for the grid server instance. By default, the searchable functionality is enabled.
      Parameters:
      enable - a boolean value indicating whether searching should be enabled or not
      onlyTextColumns - a boolean value indicating whether to search only in text columns or not
      hiddenColumns - a boolean value indicating whether to search hidden columns or not
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with searching enabled or disabled based on the parameters

    • searchable

      IGridServer<T> searchable(Consumer<SearchOptions> searchOptions)
      Enables or disables the searchable functionality for the grid server instance based on the specified search options.
      Parameters:
      searchOptions - a Consumer function that accepts a SearchOptions parameter and is used to set the search options for the grid server instance
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the searchable functionality enabled or disabled based on the search options

    • autoGenerateColumns

      IGridServer<T> autoGenerateColumns()
      Automatically generates columns for the grid server instance.
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with automatically generated columns

    • setRemoveDiacritics

      IGridServer<T> setRemoveDiacritics(String methodName)
      Sets the method name for removing diacritics in the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      methodName - the name of the method for removing diacritics
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated method name for removing diacritics

    • setPredicate

      IGridServer<T> setPredicate(jakarta.persistence.criteria.Predicate predicate)
      Sets the predicate for filtering the data in the grid server instance.
      Parameters:
      predicate - the predicate used for filtering the data
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated predicate

    • setOrder

      IGridServer<T> setOrder(List<jakarta.persistence.criteria.Order> orderList)
      Sets the order of the grid server instance based on the provided list of orders.
      Parameters:
      orderList - the list of orders to set for the grid server
      Returns:
      the grid server instance with the updated order

    • getItemsToDisplay

      ItemsDTO<T> getItemsToDisplay()
      Retrieves the items to display in the grid.
      Returns:
      an instance of ItemsDTO containing the items, totals, and pager information

    • getGrid

      IGrid<T> getGrid()
      Retrieves the grid instance.
      Returns:
      the grid instance
